Python API reference¶

AMPL classes¶

All functions and classes provided by the AMPL API reside in namespace amplpy. For brevity the namespace will be omitted.

  • AMPL
  • DataFrame
  • Environment
  • Runnable
  • OutputHandler
  • ErrorHandler

  • Variable
  • Constraint
  • Objective
  • Set
  • Parameter
